scripts.cy:run:chrome: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/verifier.cy.js' --config-file cypress.config.js --browser chrome && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/verifier2.cy.js' --config-file cypress2.config.js --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run:electron: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/verifier.cy.js' --config-file cypress.config.js --browser electron && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/verifier2.cy.js' --config-file cypress2.config.js --browser electron
scripts.cy:run:local:both: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/verifier.cy.js' --config-file cypress.config.js --browser chrome  && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/verifier2.cy.js' --config-file cypress2.config.js --browser chrome ; npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/verifier.cy.js' --config-file cypress.config.js --browser electron  && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/verifier2.cy.js' --config-file cypress2.config.js --browser electron
scripts.cy:run:record:chromeAndelectron: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/verifier.cy.js' --config-file cypress.config.js --browser chrome  --record  --key c2a60d65-0bc3-4644-a7b2-656d0c161b7f && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/verifier2.cy.js' --config-file cypress2.config.js --browser chrome --record  --key c2a60d65-0bc3-4644-a7b2-656d0c161b7f ; npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/verifier.cy.js' --config-file cypress.config.js --browser electron --record  --key c2a60d65-0bc3-4644-a7b2-656d0c161b7f && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/verifier2.cy.js' --config-file cypress2.config.js --browser electron --record  --key c2a60d65-0bc3-4644-a7b2-656d0c161b7f
scripts.cy:record:folders: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/test1/* --config-file cypress.config.js --browser chrome --record --key c2a60d65-0bc3-4644-a7b2-656d0c161b7f & npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/test2/* --config-file cypress2.config.js --browser electron --record --key c2a60d65-0bc3-4644-a7b2-656d0c161b7f
scripts.cy:first:folder: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/test1/* --config-file cypress.config.js --browser chrome --record --key c2a60d65-0bc3-4644-a7b2-656d0c161b7f -- --group spec1 --ci-build-id $BUILD_ID --parallel
scripts.cy:second:folder: npx cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/test2/* --config-file cypress2.config.js --browser electron --record --key c2a60d65-0bc3-4644-a7b2-656d0c161b7f -- --group spec1 --ci-build-id $BUILD_ID --parallel
